description: ff. 267. 310 x 200; 203 x 130 mm. 21 lin. Rabīʻ I, 1040. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 511 (no. 1); S I, 704. Also contains the supplement (dhayl). Incip.: ... قال ... قال الله جل من قائل واذا اردنا ان نهلك قرىة
author: Sharīf al-Murtaḍá, ʻAlam al-Hudá ʻAlī ibn al-ḥusayn, 966-1044 or 5.
title: Ghurar al-fawāʼid wa-durar al-qalāʼid.
creator: Sharīf al-Murtaḍá, ʻAlam al-Hudá ʻAlī ibn al-ḥusayn, 966-1044 or 5.
subject: Qurʼan—Commentaries—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
